    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model(org.json.JSONObject selfAsJson)
        Constructs a model object from a json representation. The setGravConstant() method must be called following construction and prior to using the model.
        Parameters:
        selfAsJson -

      • getMap

        public java.util.List<ImageResourceWrapper> getMap()
        Get a map of the stationary in-game entities.
        Returns:
        A list of the relative positions of the landmark physics entities.

      • getFrame

        public java.util.List<ImageResourceWrapper> getFrame(int xDiff,
                                                     int yDiff)
        Get the positions of a subset of in-game entities.
        Positions will be given as 2D integer points, corresponding directly to in screen positions.
        Parameters:
        xDiff - The limit of observation in the x direction;
        i.e range = [0, xDiff]
        intended: The width of the display screen.
        yDiff - The limit of observation in the y direction;
        i.e domain = [0, yDiff]
        intended: The height of the display screen.
        Returns:
        A list of entities which appear (wholly, or partially) in the given frame
